name: UTILITI
description: Designing a scalable, Kubernetes-based, and performant Minecraft network, and integrating in-house "Play to Earn" features.

projects.name: Hero Galaxy - Minecraft
projects.description: A Minecraft server network, built with containerized 'minigame' instances, and integrated "Play to Earn" rewards upon completion of minigames. This was back in the NFT Worlds days, wasn't that fun!
